article_title: Obamacare Taxes On The Poor And The Middle Class Held At Bay

article_metadata.description: Congress did a big favor last week for about one third of seniors on Medicare, roughly two-thirds of low-income families on Medicaid, people who are getting insurance in the (Obamacare) exchanges and everyone else with private insurance – whether obtained at work or on their own. What did Congress do [...]
